error.title: Something went wrong!
error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

metadata.title: Next.js Starter Template
metadata.description: Modern web application starter template built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, shadcn/ui and with a lot of built-in features.

footer.description: Modern web application starter template built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, shadcn/ui and with a lot of built-in features.

home.title: Next.js Starter Template
home.description: Modern web application starter template built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, shadcn/ui and with a lot of built-in features.

responsiveLayout.title: Responsive Layout System
responsiveLayout.description: Advanced header with mobile-friendly drawer navigation using Vaul. Supports nested menu items with unified data source that powers both header and footer navigation.

unifiedConfiguration.title: Unified Configuration
unifiedConfiguration.description: Centralized config folder serving as single source of truth for site metadata, navigation links, contact information, legal content, and business details. Eliminates hardcoded values across components.

seoFoundation.title: SEO-Optimized Foundation
seoFoundation.description: Comprehensive SEO setup with auto-generated OG images, sitemap, and robots.txt. Perfect default for most projects for optimal search engine visibility that requires almost zero maintenance.

gdprConsent.title: GDPR Compliance System
gdprConsent.description: Customizable EU-compliant consent system with granular controls. Supports analytics, marketing, and functional tracking with user preferences and easy consent management.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy Ready
privacyPolicy.description: Pre-built GDPR-compliant privacy policy page with configurable legal information. Includes data processing details, user rights, and cookie usage transparency.

contactForm.title: Contact Form with Protection
contactForm.description: Production-ready contact form with Cloudflare Turnstile captcha integration. Features form validation, error handling, and API route submission with proper feedback mechanisms.

themeManagement.title: Advanced Theme Management
themeManagement.description: Sophisticated theme switcher supporting light, dark, and system preferences. Uses next-themes for seamless transitions with persistent user preferences and proper SSR handling.

heroSystem.title: Hero Component System
heroSystem.description: Flexible hero section components with background patterns, content management, and responsive layouts. Includes grid backgrounds, action buttons, and customizable content structures.

newsletterCta.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletterCta.description: Stay up to date with the latest news, insights, and updates. Join our community of subscribers and never miss important announcements.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

login.title: Log in
login.description: Access your account to manage settings and preferences.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Create a new account to start using the platform.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them on our website

whatAreCookies.title: 2. What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, mobile phone) when you visit a website. In addition to cookies, we may also use localStorage and sessionStorage to store data directly in your browser. They help us ensure the website functions correctly, make it more secure, understand how it performs, and analyze what works and where it needs improvement.

howWeUseCookies.title: 3. How we use cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: Our website uses first-party and third-party cookies for several purposes. First-party cookies are mostly necessary for the website to function the right way, and they do not collect any of your personally identifiable data. The third-party cookies used on our website are mainly for understanding how the website performs, how you interact with our website, keeping our services secure, and providing better user experience.

management.title: 5. How to manage your storage preferences
management.description: You can manage your preferences at any time using the button below or through your browser settings. You can block or delete cookies, localStorage, and sessionStorage data. Restricting these technologies may impact the functionality of this website.

contact.title: 6. Contact us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this policy, you can contact us at:

consentChangeCheck.purpose: Tracks consent changes to refresh scripts.

cookies.name: _ga
cookies.purpose: Used to distinguish users for statistical purposes.

gdprPolicy.principles: This Personal Data Processing Policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") describes how
gdprPolicy.controller: (hereinafter also referred to as the "Controller"), processes and protects personal data of its customers, partners, and other individuals (hereinafter referred to as "data subjects").
gdprPolicy.websiteInfo: This Policy applies to the processing of personal data on the website
gdprPolicy.dataCollectedDescription: The Controller, in accordance with applicable legislation, collects and processes the following personal data:
gdprPolicy.purposesDescription: Personal data is processed on a lawful basis (e.g., contract performance, consent, legal obligation), especially for these purposes:
gdprPolicy.retentionDescription: We retain personal data for the period necessary to achieve the purpose of processing, but no longer than
gdprPolicy.rightsDescription: Data subjects have the following rights under the GDPR:
gdprPolicy.defaultRights: In accordance with GDPR, data subjects have the right to access personal data, the right to rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and the right to object to processing. They may also withdraw their consent at any time if processing is based on consent.
gdprPolicy.contactDescription: To exercise your rights and for further information regarding the processing of personal data, you can contact the Controller at:
gdprPolicy.complaintDescription: If you believe your rights are being violated, you also have the right to file a complaint with the supervisory authority in the Czech Republic:
gdprPolicy.supervisoryAuthority: The Office for Personal Data Protection
gdprPolicy.thirdPartiesTitle: 4. Sharing personal data with third parties
gdprPolicy.thirdPartiesDescription: Your personal data may be accessed by the following processors and third parties:

dataPurposes: Providing services and fulfilling contractual obligations
Responding to inquiries and communicating with prospective clients
Managing user accounts and customer support
Improving the quality of our services and developing new features
Marketing and promotion of our products and services (based on consent)
Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations
Fraud prevention, security, and abuse prevention
Analysis and statistical processing for internal purposes
Protecting our legitimate interests and legal claims
defaults.dataRetention: 5 years from the end of the contractual relationship or withdrawal of consent, unless otherwise required by law

banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized content. You can choose to accept all cookies or customize your preferences.

dialog.title: Cookie Consent Settings
dialog.description: Manage your cookie preferences. Blocking some cookies may impact your experience.

necessary.label: Necessary
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function. Enable basic features like page navigation and secure areas.

functional.label: Functional
functional.description: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.

analytics.label: Analytics
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve content and user experience.

marketing.label: Marketing
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

dialog.moreInfo: For more information about how we use cookies, please read our
